original_text: From Zebulun's tribe, there were 50,000 brave men who were ready to fight. They knew how to use many different kinds of weapons. They were completely faithful to David.
korean_text: 스불론 중에서 모든 무기를 가지고 전열을 갖추고 두 마음을 품지 아니하고 능히 진영에 나아가서 싸움을 잘하는 자가 오만 명이요

sentences.original_text: From Zebulun's tribe, there were 50,000 brave men
sentences.korean_translation: 스불론 지파에서 5만 명의 용감한 사람들이 있었다

sentences.original_text: They knew how to use many different kinds of weapons
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 종류의 무기를 사용하는 방법을 알고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They were completely faithful to David
